msg: Minor reformatting to put , on the end of a param line instead of at the beginning of the next line.

author: vgritsenko
msg: If classpath: location is passed to SourceResourceLoader,
it could be incorrectly resolved by the SourceResolver as Avalon's FileSource.
Check for classpath: and call delegate Spring ResourceLoader to fix this.

author: vgritsenko
msg: To avoid exception, copied correctUrl to ConfigurationReader.
